1886-87 Old Judge N172 #114-3 TOM DALY Chicago Cubs. Competed for 17 years in the Major Leagues. Played catcher, second and third. SOLD

1886-87 Old Judge N172 #45-3 CALIFORNIA BROWN New York Giants. Shown in catcher's gear of the era. SOLD.

Prices are net to me, delivered to you.
